attributes.action: Christmas Bonus for people on Job Seekers Allowance
attributes.additional_details: There is a christmas bonus of £10 in December for every other benefit than Job Seekers Allowance. Although its not alot of money i feel people on JSA should be entitled to this bonus too. Its discriminatory that Job Seekers are left out we celebrate christmas too!  If anything JSA is is the lowest paid benefit so JSA People Should be entitled to it.
